ValidationRule.description: C52 - if Binder Cover Option (Art__c) value = 'No Logo or Text,' then the Logo for the Binder and Client Name to be Printed on Binder fields must be Null.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ($RecordType.Name = "Handbook HR Solutions Order Record Type"), ( ISPICKVAL(Art__c, 'No Logo or Text') ), ( (NOT(ISPICKVAL(Logo_for_the_Binder__c, ''))) || (NOT(ISBLANK(Client_Name_to_be_Printed_on_Binder__c))) ), (Historical_Order_Indicator__c = 0), (NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"HR Essentials"))), (NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator"))) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can not select a value for the Logo for the Binder and Client Name to be Printed on Binder fields when selecting a Binder Cover Option value of 'No Logo or Text.
